title: WeFilm
subtitle: A native app prototype for collaborative filming on mobile

paragraphs: WeFilm, allows the users to collaborate on a creative video project by simply using mobile devices. Unlike many other social media which address personal life, WeFilm emphasizes the social aspect of social media by connecting and involving people across the world in a creative way. Users create a short video on their phone and relay it to a list of friends through messaging, creating a ﬁnal collaborative piece comprised many individual contributions.

Inspired by the artist movement “The Exquisite Corpse”, the fundamental idea of WeFilm is to record a short video and pass it onto the next person to continue recording. When a clip is ﬁnished, it is uploaded to the server and whoever receives the request to continue is able to view the previous clip, and then record a video response. In the end, the server will combine the clips and generate a ﬁnal video to save and share.
First place at StartUp Weekend Providence 2013
